intro.heading: Customer-Focused Problem Solver
intro.description1: I'm a Technical Support Specialist with over 2 years of hands-on experience resolving complex software, hardware, and networking issues in high-volume environments. My focus is on providing excellent customer support while efficiently troubleshooting technical problems.
intro.description2: Proficient in Linux systems, remote support tools, and ticketing systems like Zendesk and Jira. I have a strong understanding of DNS, TCP/IP, and VPN configurations, and I'm continuously expanding my skills in frontend development and DevOps practices.

about.heading: Technical Support Specialist
about.description: Customer-focused Technical Support Specialist with a proven track record in resolving complex technical issues. Experienced in Linux/Windows environments, network configuration (DNS, TCP/IP, VPNs), and utilizing ticketing systems like Zendesk and Jira. Committed to delivering exceptional support, building strong customer relationships, and continuously learning new technologies, including frontend development (React, Next.js) and scripting.

timeline.title: Technical Support Representative
timeline.description: Provided technical support via phone, email, and chat, diagnosing account, software, and networking problems. Maintained ticket workflows using Zendesk and adhered to SLAs.

timeline.title: Sales Representative
timeline.description: Provided product recommendations and mobile activations, achieving sales targets and building client relationships.

timeline.title: IT Help Desk Technician
timeline.description: Supported students and staff with hardware/software issues in Windows and Linux environments. Resolved tickets using Jira and assisted with network troubleshooting.

timeline.title: Customer Service Representative
timeline.description: Handled customer inquiries, billing disputes, and product troubleshooting.

timeline.title: Diploma in Computer Networking
timeline.description: Studied IP networking, system administration, security, routing & switching. Completed a capstone project building a secure LAN.
